roleset.name: laugh quietly
roleset.note: CHUCKLE-V NOTES: Based on sentences in wsj. Member of VNcls nonverbal_expression-40.2. Updated by Julia, 11/2010. (from chuckle.01-v)

example.name: hyuck hyuck
example.text: ``Pickin' one or two,'' says [the guide]-1, *trace*-1 chuckling.

roleset.name: mode of speaking
roleset.note: CHUCKLE-V NOTES: Member of VNcls manner_speaking-37.3. Updated by Julia, 11/2010. (from chuckle.02-v)

example.name: missing hearer
example.text: ``[Long-term investing -- that's not Steinhardt's style]-1,'' chuckles *trace*-1 an investor who once worked at Steinhardt Partners.
example.arg: an investor who once worked at Steinhardt Partners
